publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3711 Tommy Sheridan: Closure of Scottish Mirror and Cuts at the Daily Record and Sunday Mail—That the Parliament condemns the decision of Trinity Mirror Management to close down the Scottish Mirror, with the loss of 32 jobs, and the swingeing cuts proposed at the Daily Record and the Sunday Mail, which represent cruel industrial vandalism and will result in severe distress for those made redundant and lead to a real reduction in the quality of Scottish news coverage; supports trade union action to resist these disgraceful cuts, and expresses solidarity with the sacked Mirror workers.
